DeviceSocketNoHandler.description: Some connection failed, so please try again.

Error.description: Something went wrong. Please retry or contact us.

GenuineCheckFailed.description: Something went wrong. Please try again or contact Ledger Support when in doubt.

HardResetFail.title: Oops, could not reset
HardResetFail.description: Please retry or contact Ledger Support.

InvalidAddress.title: This is not a valid {{currencyName}} address!

LatestMCUInstalledError.title: Oops, nothing to update
LatestMCUInstalledError.description: Needlessly tried to update the device microcontroller. Contact Ledger Support if there's a problem with your device.

LedgerAPIError.title: Sorry, try again (API HTTP {{status}})
LedgerAPIError.description: Interacting with Ledger's API server went wrong. Please retry.

LedgerAPIErrorWithMessage.description: Please retry or contact Ledger Support.

LedgerAPINotAvailable.title: Sorry, {{currencyName}} services unavailable
LedgerAPINotAvailable.description: Please retry or contact Ledger Support.

ManagerAppAlreadyInstalled.title: Oops, that's already installed.
ManagerAppAlreadyInstalled.description: Check your device to see which apps are already installed.

ManagerAppRelyOnBTC.description: Install the latest Bitcoin and Ethereum apps first.

ManagerDeviceLocked.title: Please unlock your device
ManagerDeviceLocked.description: Your device was locked. Please unlock it.

ManagerNotEnoughSpace.title: Sorry, not enough storage left
ManagerNotEnoughSpace.description: Please uninstall some apps to make space. This will not affect your crypto assets.

ManagerUninstallBTCDep.title: Sorry, this app is required
ManagerUninstallBTCDep.description: Uninstall the Bitcoin or Ethereum app last.

NoAddressesFound.title: Sorry, no accounts found
NoAddressesFound.description: Something went wrong with address calculation, try again or contact Ledger Support.

NotEnoughBalance.description: Make sure the account to debit has sufficient balance

NotEnoughBalanceBecauseDestinationNotCre.title: Recipient address is inactive. Send at least {{minimalAmount}} to activate it

PairingFailed.title: Pairing unsuccessful
PairingFailed.description: Please try again or contact Ledger Support when in doubt.

PasswordIncorrect.title: The password you entered is incorrect

PasswordsDontMatch.title: The password you entered does not match

SyncError.title: Synchronization error
SyncError.description: Something went wrong with the blockchains synchronization.  Please retry or contact us.

TimeoutError.title: Oops, a time out occurred
TimeoutError.description: It took too long for the server to respond.

TimeoutTagged.description: It took too long for the server to respond.

TransportError.title: Something went wrong. Please reconnect your device.

TransportStatusError.title: Something went wrong. Please reconnect your device.

UpdateYourApp.description: Uninstall and reinstall the {{managerAppName}} app in the Manager

UserRefusedAddress.title: Receive address rejected
UserRefusedAddress.description: Please try again or contact Ledger Support

UserRefusedFirmwareUpdate.description: Please retry or contact Ledger Support

UserRefusedOnDevice.title: Transaction refused on device
UserRefusedOnDevice.description: Please retry or contact Ledger Support in case of doubt.

WrongDeviceForAccount.title: Oops, wrong device for ‘{{accountName}}’.
WrongDeviceForAccount.description: The connected device is not associated with the account you selected. Please connect the right device.

generic.title: {{message}}
generic.description: Something went wrong. Please retry or contact us.

bluetooth.locationRequiredTitle: Location is required for Bluetooth LE
bluetooth.locationRequiredMessage: On Android, location permission is required to be able to list Bluetooth LE devices.
bluetooth.checkEnabled: It seems bluetooth is disabled on your mobile. Go to settings and enable bluetooth to pair a Nano X

location.disabled: It seems location detection is disabled on your mobile. Go to settings and enable location to activate bluetooth.

exchange.title: Trade & Exchange
exchange.subtitle: Try a few services we've selected
exchange.coinhouse: Coinhouse is a trusted platform for individuals and institutional investors looking to analyze, acquire, sell and securely store crypto assets.
exchange.changelly: Changelly is a popular instant crypto asset exchange with 100+ coins and tokens listed.
exchange.coinmama: Coinmama is a financial service that makes it fast, safe and fun to buy digital assets, anywhere in the world.
exchange.simplex: Simplex is a EU licensed financial institution, providing a fraudless credit card payment solution.
exchange.paybis: it is safe and easy to Buy Bitcoin with credit card from PayBis. Service operates in US, Canada, Germany, Russia and Saudi Arabia.
exchange.luno: Luno makes it safe and easy to buy, store and learn about cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin and Ethereum
exchange.shapeshift: ShapeShift is an online marketplace where users can buy and sell digital assets. It is a fast and secure way for the world to buy and sell digital assets, with no lengthy signup process, no counterparty risk, and no friction.
exchange.genesis: Genesis is an institutional trading firm offering liquidity and borrow for digital currencies, including bitcoin, bitcoin cash, ethereum, ethereum classic, litecoin, and XRP.
exchange.kyber: Kyber is a trading platform for exchange and conversion of ERC-20 tokens

unlock.biometricsTitle: Please authenticate to Ledger Live app
unlock.title: Welcome back

reset.description: Reset all Ledger Live data, including accounts and settings? The private keys providing access to your crypto assets remain secure on your device and Recovery sheet.

stepWelcome.title: Welcome to Ledger Live
stepWelcome.desc: Easily manage crypto secured by your {{fullDeviceName}}. Everywhere you go.

stepChooseDevice.fallbackDesc: You can import your {{oldDeviceName}} accounts from Ledger Live desktop to check your balance on the go. To manage secure transactions everywhere you go, consider upgrading to a {{fullDeviceName}}.

stepSetupPin.step2: Press both buttons to choose <1><1>Setup as new device.</1></1>
stepSetupPin.step2-restore: Press both buttons to choose <1><1>Restore from recovery phrase.</1></1>
stepSetupPin.step3: Press left or right button to select a digit. Press both to validate.

modal.step3: Never use a device supplied with a PIN code or a recovery phrase

stepWriteRecovery.step1: Write <1><1>Word #1</1></1> in position 1 on a blank recovery sheet
stepWriteRecovery.step2: Press the right button to continue and write down all 24 words.
stepWriteRecovery.step3: Confirm your recovery phrase: select and validate each word by pressing both buttons.

modal.step1: Carefully secure your 24-word recovery phrase out of sight.
modal.step2: Make sure you are the sole holder of your recovery phrase.
modal.step3: Ledger does not keep any backup of your recovery phrase.
modal.step4: Never use a device supplied with a recovery phrase or a PIN code.

stepWriteRecoveryRestore.step1: Choose the length of your recovery phrase.
stepWriteRecoveryRestore.step2: Enter the first letters of <1><1>Word #1</1></1> until suggested words appear.
stepWriteRecoveryRestore.step3: Choose <1><1>Word #1</1></1> from the suggested words by pressing both buttons.
stepWriteRecoveryRestore.step4: Repeat the process until the last word.

pinCode.title: Did you choose your PIN code by yourself?
pinCode.error: Never use a device supplied with a PIN code. Please contact us when in doubt.

recoveryPhrase.title: Did you choose your recovery phrase by yourself?
recoveryPhrase.error: Never use a device supplied with a recovery phrase. Please contact us when in doubt.

stepPassword.desc: Set a password to prevent unauthorized access to Ledger Live data on your phone.

stepFinish.title: Your device is ready!
stepFinish.desc: Install some apps on your device and access your portfolio

stepScanQR.title: Please go to <1>Settings > General > Export accounts</1> in the desktop app and scan the QR code

portfolio.summary: Here's the summary of your account

emptyState.title: Add accounts to your portfolio
emptyState.desc: Open the Manager to install apps on your Ledger device before you start adding accounts to your portfolio

tradingDisclaimer.title: Trade Safely
tradingDisclaimer.text1: Before sending and receiving crypto assets, educate yourself to make informed decisions. Crypto assets are volatile and the prices can go up and down. Carefully evaluate your trading goals and the financial risk you are willing to take.
tradingDisclaimer.text2: Please beware that Ledger does not provide financial, tax, or legal advice. You should take such decisions on your own or rely on opinions of licensed experts.

emptyState.title: No crypto assets yet?
emptyState.desc: Make sure the <1><0>{{managerAppName}}</0></1> app is installed and start receiving

delete.title: Delete Account
delete.confirmationDesc: Are you sure you want to delete <1><0>{{accountName}}</0></1> account?

scan.title: Scan QR Code

descTop.line1: Please open Ledger Live desktop and go to

scan.descBottom: Please put the QR code within the square

fallback.title: Enable camera
fallback.desc: Please enable Camera in Settings to scan QR codes

importNotification.message: Your accounts have successfully been imported!

display.title: General
display.languageDesc: Set the language displayed in Ledger Live.
display.passwordDesc: Set a password to prevent unauthorized access to Ledger Live data on your phone.
display.counterValueDesc: Set the currency shown next to your balance and operations.
display.exchangeDesc: Set provider of exchange rate from Bitcoin to {{fiat}}
display.stockDesc: Choose Western to display an increase in market value in green. Choose Eastern to display an increase in market value in red.
display.reportErrorsDesc: Automatically send reports to help Ledger fix bugs.
display.developerModeDesc: Show developer apps in the Manager and enable testnet apps.
display.analyticsDesc: Enable analytics to help Ledger understand how to improve user experience.

analyticsModal.title: Share analytics
analyticsModal.desc: Enable analytics to help Ledger understand how to improve user experience
analyticsModal.bullet6: Number of accounts, currencies and operations

display.technicalDataDesc: Ledger will automatically collect fully anonymized technical data to help improve user experience.

technicalDataModal.title: Technical data
technicalDataModal.desc: Ledger will automatically collect fully anonymized technical data to help improve user experience
technicalDataModal.bullet2: Ledger Live version, OS region, language and region

display.termsOfUseDesc: By continuing you acknowledge that you have read and agree to the <1>Terms of Use</1>.

currencies.title: Currencies
currencies.desc: Set rate provider and number of confirmations per crypto.
currencies.rateProviderDesc: Choose the provider of the rate between {{currencyTicker}} and Bitcoin
currencies.confirmationNbDesc: Number of network confirmations to mark a transaction as confirmed.

about.title: About
about.desc: App information, terms and conditions, and privacy policy.
about.appDescription: The perfect companion for your Ledger Nano X. Add new crypto assets and check your balance in just a few taps.
about.termsConditionsDesc: By using Ledger Live you are deemed to have accepted our terms and conditions.
about.privacyPolicyDesc: Learn what personal data we collect, why and how we use it.

liveReview.title: Rate the app!
liveReview.android: Review in the Google Play store

help.title: Help
help.desc: Learn more about Ledger Live or get help.
help.supportDesc: A problem? Get help using Ledger Live with your hardware wallet.
help.configureDeviceDesc: Set up as new or restore a device. Accounts and settings are preserved.
help.clearCacheModalDesc: Clearing the Ledger Live cache forces network resynchronization. Your settings and accounts are not affected. The private keys to access your crypto assets in the blockchain remain secure on your Ledger device and on your Recovery sheet.
help.exportLogsDesc: Exporting Ledger Live logs may be necessary for troubleshooting purposes.
help.hardResetDesc: Erase all Ledger Live data stored on your phone, including accounts and settings.

receive.title: Receive funds
receive.verifySkipped: Your receive address has not been confirmed on your Ledger device. Please verify your {{accountType}} address for optimal security.
receive.verifyPending: Your receive address has not been confirmed on your Ledger device. Please verify your {{accountType}} address for optimal security.
receive.verified: You have verified your receive address on your Ledger Device.

fallback.title: Enable camera
fallback.desc: Please enable Camera in Settings to scan QR codes

summary.infoTotalDesc: Includes transaction amount and the selected network fees

validation.title: Please verify all transaction details on your Ledger Nano X
validation.message: Confirm the transaction on your device to securely sign it
validation.disclaimer: Always verify that your device displays the address exactly as provided by the recipient
validation.confirm: Your account balance will update once the blockchain has confirmed the transaction

quitConfirmation.title: Cancel add account
quitConfirmation.desc: You are about to cancel the Add account flow, do you wish to continue?

success.desc: Add more accounts or view your current ones

addAccounts.synchronizingDesc: We are synchronizing your accounts, this can take a while...
addAccounts.noAccountToCreate: No <1><0>{{currencyName}}</></> account was found to create. Restart the flow and sync your accounts
addAccounts.cantCreateAccount: There are no transactions on your last created <1><0>{{accountName}}</></> account. You must first receive crypto assets on that account before you can add a new one.

SelectDevice.title: Choose your device
SelectDevice.headerDescription: Please make sure your {{fullDeviceName}} is unlocked with Bluetooth enabled

connecting.title: Connecting “{{deviceName}}”
connecting.description: Don't forget to turn on your device and enter your PIN to unlock it

currencyApp.title: Open app {{managerAppName}}...
currencyApp.description: On your device, open the app {{managerAppName}}.

accountApp.title: Open app {{managerAppName}}...
accountApp.description: On your device associated to account ‘{{accountName}}’, open the app {{managerAppName}}.

receiveVerify.title: Verify address on device
receiveVerify.description: A <1><0>{{currencyName}}</0></1> address <3><0>will be displayed</0></3> on your device. Carefully verify that it matches the address on your phone.

getDeviceName.title: Press both buttons to allow get device name

editDeviceName.title: Press both buttons to allow set device name

Paired.title: Nano X paired with success!
Paired.desc: You can now use your Nano X on your Ledger Live mobile App to <1><0>send & receive funds</0></1>. You can also mange your device on the <1><1>Manager</1></1> section

Pairing.title: Pairing...
Pairing.subtitle: Please don’t turn off your Nano X. Follow screen instructions.

GenuineCheck.title: Genuine check
GenuineCheck.accept: Please don’t turn off your {{deviceName}} and allow <1><0>Ledger Manager</0></1>

ScanningHeader.title: We are searching for Nano X
ScanningHeader.desc: Please be sure power is on, you have enter your PIN and bluetooth is enabled

ScanningTimeout.title: Oops, no device found
ScanningTimeout.desc: Please make sure your {{fullDeviceName}} is unlocked with Bluetooth enabled

unpair.title: Unpair device
unpair.description: Are you sure? You can pair your {{fullDeviceName}} again at any time.

Installing.title: Firmware updating...
Installing.subtitle: If asked on device, please enter your pin code to finish the process

FirmwareUpdateReleaseNotes.introTitle: You are about to install <1><0>firmware version {{version}}.</0></1>
FirmwareUpdateReleaseNotes.introDescription1: Please note that all the apps installed on your device will be deleted. You will be able to re-install your apps after the firmware update.
FirmwareUpdateReleaseNotes.introDescription2: This does not affect your crypto assets.

FirmwareUpdateCheckId.title: Identifier
FirmwareUpdateCheckId.description: Please press both buttons on your {{fullDeviceName}} if it displays the same identifier:

FirmwareUpdateMCU.title: Restart device
FirmwareUpdateMCU.desc1: Unplug your device from your computer
FirmwareUpdateMCU.desc2: Press and hold left button and plug your device until the processing screen appears

FirmwareUpdateConfirmation.title: Firmware updated
FirmwareUpdateConfirmation.description: Open the Manager to re-install the apps on your device
